snippet: The Obama administration has not made a case for killing American citizens without judicial review.
abstract: Editorial expresses concern about Atty Gen Eric Holder Jr's rejection of oversight and accountability when it comes to killing American citizens who are suspected of plotting terrorist acts; asserts that the Obama administration has yet to make a convincing case for killing American citizens without judicial review; urges the administration to publish the Office of Legal Counsel memo that justified the killing of Anwar al-Awlaki.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration has not made a case for killing American citizens without judicial review.
